name: Don't Wake the Cat Remastered
description:
Drag the character to the bathroom before the timer runs out and she pees herself. 

Don't hit the cat or you'll wake it!!!

Note: if the game is running slow, play in Chrome with no other tabs open :D

--------------

One night I couldn't sleep, so  I spent 2 hours building out an incredibly ugly concept game called Don't Wake the Cat.  I enjoyed the dumbness of it so much, I decided to make a more attractive version. However, since the original's charm was partially attributed to its hideousness (definitely not its tight mechanics and game play) I've kept it playable here: Don't Wake the Cat.
